articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Men's Premier Soccer Match
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Men's Premier Soccer Match
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- There was finals for Torch Cup between the April 25 Team of the Korean People's Army and Sonbong Team of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, both men's premier soccer teams, at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Wednesday.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un appeared in the tribune of honor.
					
					 Among the spectators were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Jo Yon Jun, members of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, leading officials of the support organizations for various sports events, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, those in the sports field, sportspersons, service personnel of the People's Army and youth and students in the city.
					
					 The match started with the kick-off of the Sonbong Team. 
					
					 The first half ended scoreless even though both teams traded attacks and counterattacks from the outset.
					
					 At the second half they changed their attack tactics and formation of defense.
					
					 The goalkeeper of the April 25 Team narrowly punched away the ball strongly kicked by player No. 28 of  the Sonbong Team in the first minute of the second half, but  its player No. 7 lost no time to kick it, scoring the first goal.
					
					 The April 25 Team came out in all-out attack, making a good use of its tactical and physical features, to counter its rival's tactics of persistent attack with nimble and quick passes.
					
					 Player No. 11 of the April 25 Team scored the equalizer with heading at around 20th minute of the second half.
					
					 The Sonbong Team had an upperhand in ball control in the mid field and sought chances of scoring a goal by flank attacks. Its player No. 15 made a smart kick from the area 17 meters from the goalposts at around the 30th minute of the second half, scoring another goal.
					
					 The April 25 Team, however, was not disappointed but countered its rival's attacks through nimble and fast passes and two and three men combination, equalizing the score in the referee's time.
					
					 The two teams played an extra time game as they drew 2:2. 
					
					 There were many chances of scoring goals but no team succeeded in doing so. So there were eleven meter penalty kicks. Five players from each team participated in the penalty kick but none of them proved to be winner. The continued penalty kick ended in 8:7 in favor of the Sonbong Team.
					
					 The spectators sent warm applause to the players who fully showcased high technique, mental power and staunch will. 
					
					 As the match was over, Kim Jong Un acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the players and spectators.
					
					 He invited the players and coaches of the Sonbong Team to come up to the tribune, congratulated them on their success and had a photo taken with them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign Heads of State
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign Heads of State
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent messages to the heads of state of different countries in reply to their congratulatory messages sent to him on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Among them were Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria, Alpha Conde, president of Guinea, Hifikepunye Pohamba, president of Namibia, Thomas Motsoahe Thabane, prime minister of Lesotho, Michael Chilufya Sata, president of Zambia, Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of Equatorial Guinea, Idriss Deby Itno, president of Chad, Alassane Ouattara, president of Cote d'Ivoire, Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of DR Congo, Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, president of Togo, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, and Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of Uganda.
					
					 He, in the messages, expressed deep thanks for extending warm congratulations and best wishes on the anniversary.
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and relevant countries would grow stronger, he wished them successes in their work for the development and prosperity of their countries.

articles.title: Agreement on Organizing and Operating North-South Joint Committee for KIZ Adopted
articles.content:
Agreement on Organizing and Operating North-South Joint Committee for KIZ Adopted
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The north and the south Wednesday adopted an agreement on organizing and operating the north-south joint committee for the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) as a practical measure for the implementation of the agreement on normalizing operation in the KIZ.
					 The north and the south decided to organize the joint committee, set up a permanent office and necessary sections under it and consult and solve the issues arising in the course of operating the KIZ.
					
					 It was agreed to hold the 1st session of the North-South Joint Committee for the KIZ in the zone on September 2.

articles.title: Day of Songun Instituted as National Holiday in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Songun Instituted as National Holiday in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Day of Songun (Aug. 25) has been instituted as national holiday in the DPRK. 
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il visited Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on August 25, 1960. 
					
					 Thanks to this significant day, the history and tradition of the Korean revolution that started and victoriously advanced with arms have been steadily carried forward and the new era of the Juche revolution, the great Songun era advancing triumphantly along the way of Songun, has opened.
					
					 The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly decided as follows reflecting the unanimous will and desire of the Workers' Party of Korea and the army and people of the DPRK who are faithfully inheriting and glorifying forever the Songun revolutionary idea and exploits of the Generalissimo and opening up a new bright history of Songun Korea:
					
					1. It is decided that August 25, Day of Songun when the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership, is to be marked as national holiday. 
					
					2. August 25 every year will be a national holiday.
					
					3. Units and sub-units of the KPA will hoist colors of the Supreme Commander of the KPA on this day. 
					
					4. State institutions, enterprises, organizations and families will hoist flags of the DPRK on the day. 
					
					 A decree on this was issued by the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly on Monday.

articles.title: Chinese Special Envoy Visits War Museum
articles.content:
Chinese Special Envoy Visits War Museum
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Wu Dawei, special envoy of the Chinese government for the issue of the Korean Peninsula, and his party visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on Wednesday.
					 Before the statue of President Kim Il Sung acknowledging the enthusiastic cheers of people at the square where a military parade was held to mark the victory in the war, the guests paid respects to the President.
					
					 They laid a bouquet before sculpture "Victory", the monument to the victory in the war, and paid tribute to officers and men of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					
					 They went round various halls of the museum, being briefed on the fact that the army and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S. imperialists for the first time in the history under the wise guidance of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Join Young People in Marking Youth Day
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Join Young People in Marking Youth Day
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials of the DPRK joined the young people in different parts of the country in celebrating the Youth Day on Wednesday.
					 Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Phyong Hae, Ro Tu Chol and officials at national and local levels visited industrial establishments, farms and universities to congratulate the young people on the day.
					
					 The industrial establishments and universities included the Chollima Steel Complex, Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Pyongyang University of Railways, Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326, Taean Heavy Machine Complex and the Sangwon Cement Complex.
					
					 The officials together with young people placed floral baskets and bouquets before statues of peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, mosaics depicting them and monuments to their revolutionary activities and paid respects.
					
					 They went round rooms dedicated to the education in revolutionary history, rooms dedicated to the history of those industrial establishments, farms and universities, worksites and classrooms, and gave a pep talk to exemplary young people who achieved success in their work for production, construction and studying in hearty response to the New Year Address and the appeal of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They requested those young people to fulfill their mission and duty as honorable builders and main pillars of a thriving nation as befits the young vanguard grown up under the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Those young people had a good time, singing, dancing, playing sports and amusements games and holding colorful cultural events.

articles.title: Art Squad of Youth League Gives Performance
articles.content:
Art Squad of Youth League Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- An art performance "Song of Youth Defending the Sun" was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Central Youth Hall on Wednesday, the Youth Day.
					 The repertoires included dialogic poem "Gold Cushion", female solo "Song of Blessed People", mixed quartet "Our Leader Loved by the People" and agitation and male quartet "Let's Defend Socialism".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who led the Korean youth movement to victory, and the greatness of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is adding luster to the idea of giving importance to the youth.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers which reflect the pride and self-confidence of the young vanguard exalting the honor as the reserve combat unit and detached force of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un under his deep trust and loving care.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers reflecting the revolutionary optimism of the young people in the era of Songun who are making the hot wind for sports sweep across the country.
					
					 Among the audience were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, officials of the youth league and youth and students.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Mark Youth Day
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Mark Youth Day
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- There took place dancing parties of young people in different parts of the DPRK to celebrate the Youth Day.
					 Young people thronged dancing venues here including the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding and the April 25 House of Culture.
					
					 They danced merrily and happily with gratitude for General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who put forward the young people as the flower of the country and the nation and the most vibrant force of society.
					
					 They danced to the tune of songs like "A Dear Name" and "Our General Is the Best".
					
					  Singing "Ongheya", "Nodul Riverside" and other songs they represented the pride and self-esteem of young people leading a worthwhile life and enjoying happiness under the care of the mother party.
					
					 Songs "I Will Dedicate My Youth to Motherland", "At a Go" and "It Is Offensive" reflective of the spirit of young vanguard and other songs like "July 27 March", "Holiday of Great War Victory" and "The Masters of This Land Tell" resounded forth, adding to the festive mood.  
					
					 There took place similar dancing parties in the provincial seats, cities and counties.

articles.title: Men's Soccer Finals of National Sports Contest of Workers Held
articles.content:
Men's Soccer Finals of National Sports Contest of Workers Held
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The men's soccer finals of the national sports contest of workers took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Wednesday. 
					 The match was held between the teams of South and North Hamgyong provinces. 
					
					 The South Hamgyong provincial team beat the North Hwanghae provincial team 2:1 and the North Hamgyong provincial team beat the North Phyongan provincial team 1:0 at the semi-finals after group league matches. 
					
					 The finals were sharp from the beginning. 
					
					 The players of different jobs and ages fully displayed high spirit and techniques, showing off their skills. 
					
					 At the match the South Hamgyong provincial team beat its rival 2:1 to win the title at the men's soccer event.

articles.title: Sports Games Mark Youth Day
articles.content:
Sports Games Mark Youth Day
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Final matches for the Pyongyang City Students' Sports Games, which started on August 12, took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Wednesday, the Youth Day.
					 The stadium was full packed with students of 10 odd universities enjoying the Youth Day.
					
					 In the finals of football Kim Il Sung University beat Kim Hyong Jik University of Education 2:0.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University came first in men's basketball while Kim Hyong Jik University of Education in women's volleyball.
					
					 Competitions were also made in the track-and-field and defence sports events.
					
					 After all, Kim Il Sung University placed first in the total standings of the games, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education second and Kim Chaek University of Technology third.
					
					 Prizes were awarded to those universities which proved successful in the games.
					
					 Through the games, the students fully showed their high skills and collectivism cultivated through daily mass sports activities as well as their strong will to always advance straight forward under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK to Develop Tourism as One of Major Industries
articles.content:
DPRK to Develop Tourism as One of Major Industries
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is directing big efforts to developing tourism as one of major industries.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Jo Song Gyu, director of the International Travel Company of the DPRK.
					
					 Jo said:
					
					 Consistent is the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to develop tourism in the country.
					
					 Abundant in tourism resources, the country has a bright future to develop tourism.
					
					 Regular air route will be opened between Pyongyang, Lake Samji and Wonsan for local and foreign tourists.
					
					 The country also plans to open air routes between Pyongyang and Chinese cities like Shanghai and Yanji. 
					
					 Air services will also be available for people in Southeast Asia and Europe to come to DPRK for sightseeing.  
					
					 Wonsan and Mts. Paektu and Chilbo areas are likely to be linked with other countries and regions by air services. 
					
					 Economic development zones to be built in each province will serve as tourism destinations.
					
					 Hotels in Pyongyang City are being renovated at the world's level.
					
					 A number of fitness centers, service complexes and souvenir and duty-free shops will be built for tourists.
					
					 The government will allow foreigners to launch independent business or joint venture in the country to invest in tourist resorts and economic development zones and construct and manage hotels, shops and other tourist facilities.
					
					 It will render preferential treatment to foreign businesses which come to the DPRK before others so that they can begin making profits as early as possible.
					
					 It is also inviting foreign tourist experts for development of tourist resorts and operation of hotels, restaurants, etc.

articles.title: Library Built in South Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Library Built in South Hamgyong Province
 Hamhung, August 28 (KCNA) -- The South Hamgyong Province Library has been built at the foot of picturesque Tonghung Hill.
					 The library national in form and socialist in content has reading rooms, lecture rooms, catalogue search rooms, server room, lending room, stacks, etc.
					
					 Established in the library are systems of general lecture, computer lecture and mobile and ordered services for scientific and technological information.
					
					 The library will provide people in the province with full conditions needed for further enhancing their political and theoretical levels and acquiring versatile knowledge.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Youth Day
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Youth Day
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates an editorial to the Youth Day.
					 President Kim Il Sung formed the Young Communist League of Korea on August 28, Juche 16 (1927), opening up an epochal turn in developing the Korean youth movement.
					
					 General Scretary Kim Jong Il instituted this significant day as Youth Day.
					
					 The Korean youth movement is ushering in a new heyday in its development thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's idea of giving importance to the youth and under his leadership.
					
					 Giving ceaseless field guidance to the worksites for effecting a great surge, he instills patriotism and the spirit of "At a go" into the minds of the young people. He had pictures taken with sportspersons who displayed the honor of the country in international games and made sure that those who devoted their lives to the party and the leader lead an eternal life. Under his great loving care and trust, the young Korean people are devoting their all to the party, revolution, country and the people.
					
					 The young people are filled with the same spirit as displayed by the first generation of revolution, including Kim Hyok and Cha Kwang Su, who devoted their lives for their leader.
					
					 It is the patriotic spirit of the youth to beat back the aggressors at one blow by waging the all-people resistance in a decisive battle and reliably defend their native places, schools, worksites and villages, regarding it as greatest expression of patriotism to defend the country.
					
					 Not a few young people in the world have been forsaken as trouble makers of society, marginalized by history. But the young Korean people are demonstrating their might as the most powerful force to open the rosy future of the country and the nation, being loved and trusted by the party and the people.
					
					 The editorial calls upon the young people to more dynamically advance towards the rosy future of Songun Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, loudly singing the song "March of Korean Youth".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Validity of Line of Economic Construction in Era of Songun
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Validity of Line of Economic Construction in Era of Songun
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il made public work "Let Us Thoroughly Implement the Line of Economic Construction in the Era of Songun Laid Down by the Party" on August 28, Juche 92 (2003).
					 The work gives a clear exposition of the theoretical and practical matters arising in building the country's economy in the era of Songun into the advantageous and powerful one which firmly guarantees the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The work is an important one as it indicates the way of building a thriving nation on this land by increasing the might of socialist economy in every way to meet the demand in the new era of the Juche revolution, the era of Songun, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Wednesday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The essential feature of the line of economic construction in the era of Songun is that it is the most revolutionary and popular one which makes it possible to protect the dignity of the country and the nation, safeguard socialism in the complicated and acute situation and, at the same time, provide the people with the rich and highly civilized life.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the line set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea have been fully demonstrated in defending socialism and building a thriving nation in the past 10 years.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of the WPK to channel all efforts into the drive to build an economic power and improve the people's living standard so as to bring earlier the day when the Korean people lead a happy life in the world, the article concludes.

articles.title: Songun Politics Guarantees Peace, Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun Politics Guarantees Peace, Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Songun politics serves as an ever-victorious treasured sword and a great national banner the truth and validity of which were proved in hewing out the independent destiny of the nation thanks to the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article Wednesday.
					
					 It is the politics for national independence which helps reliably defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation and the politics for peace as it fully guarantees peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 If the dignity and sovereignty of a country and nation are to be defended, it is necessary to have the force for guaranteeing them. Dignity and sovereignty can not be protected by words only. This is the immutable truth proved by history and the present situation.
					
					 It is impossible to achieve national reconciliation and unity, independent reunification, peace and prosperity unless peace and security on the Korean Peninsula are protected. But for the DPRK's war deterrent for self-defence provided by the Songun politics, a war would have already broken out on the peninsula.
					
					 The Songun politics reflects the magnanimity which draws without distinction all those who want to contribute to national reunification, irrespective of their ideology, social system, political view and religious faith. It also reflects the immovable will to take the road of reunification to the last, together with those who once joined it, holding their hands.
					
					 The Songun politics is a patriotic one for defending the dignity, security and interests of all Koreans not only in the DPRK but in south Korea.
					
					 The DPRK holds aloft the banner of Songun to decisively foil the outsiders' moves for aggression and defend and achieve interests common to the nation. Herein lie the validity and invincible might of Songun politics opening up the way of carving out the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Youth to Take Lead in Struggle for Independence, Peace against Imperialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Youth to Take Lead in Struggle for Independence, Peace against Imperialism
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The prevailing situation calls upon the youth to take the lead in the struggle against the imperialists who wreck world peace and security, in order to protect the country and the nation and for the sake of themselves and the future of mankind, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The future of mankind hinges on how the youth live and struggle for the human cause of independence and global peace and security, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Very important are the mission and duty of the youth in preventing a war, defending world peace and security and building a new independent world.
					
					 The youth loving justice and truth should respond to the demand of the era by devoting their burning enthusiasm to this struggle.
					
					 They should struggle against the bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning by the imperialists. The imperialists are introducing into other countries lots of newspapers, books, magazines, photos, paintings, films and music videos which are peppered with bizarre and decadent contents. These are aimed to make the youth have interest in bourgeois ideology and culture and, through it, let them become mentally crippled and slaves subservient to them and thus reduce them to victims to the moves for aggression and war.
					
					 The youth should clearly understand this and fight it out without an inch of concession against the base and vicious moves of the imperialists to benumb the thinking power and mentality of the rising generation.
					
					 In order to discharge their noble mission for the era and mankind, the youth should strengthen international friendship and unity.
					
					 There is nothing impossible if the youth are firmly united under the banner of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Lots of Works on Economic Construction, Improvement of People's Living Published by Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Lots of Works on Economic Construction, Improvement of People's Living Published by Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- 10 years have passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il published famous work "Let Us Thoroughly Implement the Line of Economic Construction in the Era of Songun Laid Down by the Party" on August 28, Juche 92 (2003).
					 He, putting forward the idea on preferentially developing the defence industry and simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture, published many works to further develop the idea on economic construction in the era of Songun.
					
					 In several works he clearly indicated the idea that thoroughly implementing the line on economic construction in the era of Songun provides a sure guarantee for building a thriving socialist nation where the national power is strong, everything is abundant and the people lead a worthwhile life with no more to desire in the world.
					
					 The works clarify that giving priority to pilot domains of the national economy, the basic industrial fields, is a key to rapidly developing the defense industry, light industry and agriculture all at the same time, and the idea on making a breakthrough toward the building of an economic power by shoring up power, coal and metal industries and railway transport.
					
					 Expounded in the works are the issues on developing textile, footwear industry and foodstuff processing industry, ensuring the supply of raw and other materials by relying on locally available natural resources, bringing the production of daily necessities to normal, diversifying consumer goods to cater for the people's demands and taste and thoroughly meeting the scientific and technological demands in producing goods.
					
					 Also contained in the works are the ideas on taking a firm hold on the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of effecting a turn in agriculture, introducing modern scientific and technological achievements into agriculture, channeling all efforts into farming to drastically increase agricultural production so as to solve the food shortage.
					
					 The works lay out the tasks and ways for significantly developing the country's economy by pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology in all fields and units in keeping with the requirements of the IT age.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats in Building Self-supporting National Economy
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats in Building Self-supporting National Economy
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was a genius of creation and construction as he in his lifetime advanced a line of building self-supporting national economy and implemented it in the revolution and construction, opening a new era of the nation's prosperity.
					 Early in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, he defined it as one of the major tasks facing a ruling working-class party to realize independence in the economy as well as in politics.
					
					 Since the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, he had constantly adhered to the line in building the nation's economy, the line that calls for building the economy in reliance on the nation's efforts, technologies and resources.
					
					 In late Juche 39 (1950) when the country was in the thick of war, he set forth a policy on preparing for the postwar reconstruction, indicating fundamental ways to that effect.
					
					 At the 6th plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, held some days after the war, he laid down a basic line of building the economy, the line of building a self-supporting national economy, which called for giving priority to the development of heavy industry while simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture.
					
					 In hearty response to the line, workers of the Kangson Steel Plant turned out 120,000 tonnes of rolled steel at a blooming mill with a rated capacity of 60,000 tonnes and those of the Kim Chaek Iron Works produced 270,000 tonnes of pig iron at facilities with a rated capacity of 190,000 tonnes.
					
					 A first home-made tractor came out in 30 days, a truck in 40 days to be followed by manufacture of excavator and bulldozer.
					
					 Local workers also succeeded in making 8-meter turning lathe and 3,000-tonnes press.
					
					 Pyongyang City builders assembled 20 000 flats with materials, funds and man power for 7 000 flats, while machinery workers made an electric locomotive by themselves.

articles.title: Songun Is Steadfast Faith of DPRK People
articles.content:
Songun Is Steadfast Faith of DPRK People
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- It is the strong will of the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to thoroughly arm themselves with the idea of the Songun (military-first) revolution and apply it in the revolutionary struggle and construction.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un, in a talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" recently given to the Workers' Party of Korea's organ Rodong Sinmun and the Korean People's Army's organ Joson Inmingun, clarified that Songun is a proud tradition of the Korean revolution and the banner of victory and glory.
					
					 In the last century, the DPRK had been exposed to constant threats of war posed by the imperialists on its way of advancing socialist construction.
					
					 But, thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun politics, a grand plan for building a thriving nation was unfolded in the days of the Arduous March, the forced march, when the country was undergoing grim trials, and a hot wind of working fresh miracles and innovations swept across the country.
					
					 Fierce flames of the industrial revolution in the new century flared up, ushering in the era of the knowledge-based economy and monumental edifices symbolic of the era appeared in different parts of the country and art works representative of the Songun culture were created in large numbers.
					
					 His Songun politics provided the June 15 era of reunification based on the idea of "By our nation itself" as well as a precious asset for the reunification of the country and the common prosperity of the Korean nation. It also safeguarded peace in Asia and the rest of the world from the imperialists' uninterrupted war moves.
					
					 All the achievements made by the DPRK are attributable to Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary idea and his tireless efforts to that effect. 
					
					 The DPRK people will in the future, too, as in the past, invariably maintain the banner of Songun, thereby building a strong economy, achieving national reunification and defending the world's peace and security.

articles.title: Work on Line of Building Economy in Songun Era
articles.content:
Work on Line of Building Economy in Songun Era
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- It has been ten years since General Secretary Kim Jong Il made public the famous work "Let Us Thoroughly Implement the Line of Economic Construction in the Era of Songun Laid Down by the Party" on August 28, Juche 92 (2003).
					 The line calls for giving priority to the development of defence industry while developing light industry and agriculture simultaneously in the Songun (military-first) era.
					
					 The work says the line economically ensures the Songun revolutionary leadership and the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea and makes it possible to bring about a radical turn in improving the people's livelihood by appropriately combining the defence industry and economic building.
					
					 Since the publication of the work, the DPRK has registered signal successes in the economy on the basis of the achievements gained in defence industry.
					
					 Under Kim Jong Il's leadership, the defence industry was put on IT basis, which has propelled the development of heavy industry.
					
					 Production potentials were remarkably increased in light industry and agriculture.
					
					 A large number of foodstuff factories, including the Samilpho Specialties Factory and the Jangjasan Combined Foodstuff Factory, were built on a modern basis in different parts of the country, while many light industrial factories were updated, including Pyongyang Wheat Flour Processing Factory, Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory and Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory. 
					
					 The projects of land rezoning, nature-driven waterways, large-scale fruit producers and stockbreeding bases were completed, laying a solid foundation for growth of agricultural production.
					
					 All these achievements lively represent the vitality of the line.

articles.title: World's Cultural Heritages in Kaesong City of DPRK (5)
articles.content:
World's Cultural Heritages in Kaesong City of DPRK (5)
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- In Kaesong City, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, there are Koryo Songgyungwan Academy and Manwoldae, which were listed as world's cultural heritages.
					 The academy, believed to have the longest history in the world, was a top government educational institution in the period of Koryo Kingdom (918-1392).
					
					 Built in 992, it covers 10,000 square meters, with 18 buildings which give a glimpse of the architectural art in that period.
					
					 The academy's buildings were reduced to debris by the Japanese invaders during the Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598) and were rebuilt in the 1602-1610 period.
					
					 Manwoldae, located in Songak-dong, Kaesong City, is the site of royal palace dating back to the Koryo Kingdom.
					
					 Founded in 918, Koryo built a royal palace in the site next year.
					
					 The site breaks into Kungsong with royal palace buildings and Hwangsong with government's buildings. Its total area is 1.25 million square meters, 390,000 square meters of which belong to Kungsong.
					
					 The main gate of Hwangsong is Kwanghwamun in the east and the main gate of Kungsong is Sungphyongmun in the south.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Turning Back on Public Mindset
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Turning Back on Public Mindset
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on August 24 carried an editorial accusing the present chief executive of turning her back on public mindset.
					 Six months have passed since the present regime took office but the prospect of people's living is still gloomy and peace is in a fragile state, the editorial deplored.
					
					 What is most serious is that democratization is lagging behind, it said, adding the current development around the case of the Intelligence Service's interference in the election proves that the violation of democracy exists in society in actuality.
					
					 The chief executive is still keeping mum about the above-said case, it charged.
					
					 Candlelight is flaring up in streets in protest against this but the chief executive is so mistaken as to regard obstinacy and stubbornness as "principle and confidence", it ridiculed.
					
					 The authorities are pushing the opposition parties to a tight corner and intensifying political offensive and, at the same time, firing water cannon into citizens out in streets, an indication of the crude violation of democracy and human rights that plague south Korea at present, it noted.
					
					 As long as the "president" thinks that she can do everything by herself, the tasks for improving the standard of people's living and achieving peace will face difficulties, it warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Catholics Accuse Chief Executive of Snubbing Public Mindset
articles.content:
S. Korean Catholics Accuse Chief Executive of Snubbing Public Mindset
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- South Korean Catholics held a press conference in Seoul on Monday in denunciation of the puppet chief executive for not implementing her election commitments and turning aside from people's livelihood.
					 Speakers accused the chief executive of failing to keep her election commitments though she promised to conduct state investigation into the case of the Ssangyong Motors and recover the people's livelihood in the period when she was running for "presidency."
					
					 During the "presidential election" campaign she called for state policy based on "principle and confidence" but right after taking power she inflicted bigger pains on the workers, reneging on all the promises, they deplored, adding:
					
					 Workers and tens of their family members have died due to the case, with damage done by it ever increasing.
					
					 The present situation proves how preposterous and deceptive her commitments were.
					
					 They would make strenuous efforts till the "government" follows through on its promises, they warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Discloses Crimes Committed by Present Regime for Six Months
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Discloses Crimes Committed by Present Regime for Six Months
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People Monday posted an article dealing with the resentment growing stronger among south Koreans against the present puppet regime.
					 Six months have passed since the present regime emerged, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The present chief executive didn't honor all the commitments she made during the period of "presidential" election when she loudly called for "principle and confidence." She has pursued the policy of no communication with people, defending of big businesses against commoners, restoration of "yusin" dictatorship, subservient diplomacy and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 She, presenting herself as a "rescuer of the 'Grand National Party'", changed the name of the party into the "Saenuri Party" and cried out for "economic democracy" and "welfare." But it has become clear that this was aimed to serve the conservative camp's attempt to retake power.
					
					 The regime fell short of conducting state investigation into the case of Ssangyong Motors, one of the election commitments, and paid no heed to the strong call made by workers on the top of a pylon risking their lives during a sit-in.
					
					 The composition of the Cabinet in the early period of the regime proved that "yusin" has become a reality, not just a memory. The departed soul of the past military fascism and rule under the pretext of "public security" is being called back.
					
					 The diplomacy based on subjugation and confrontation with compatriots increased the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula and made south Korea's industry, agriculture and other domains of economy further dependent on the U.S., the article said, adding:
					
					 The past six months showed that any illusion about the present "government" is a taboo.
					
					 There is nothing to be expected from the Park Geun Hye regime which revealed its nature as the descendant of "yusin." There is no place for petition and compromise. It is impossible to realize vital rights and welfare without struggle and sacrifice.
					
					 The six months of Park's regime proved the truth that struggle is the only way out for the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Who Are Advancing under the Unfurled Flag Bearing the Immortal Beaming Images of the Great Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" was posted on the website of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Aug. 19.
					 The speech, made by him at the banquet on Aug. 25, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the Songun feats performed by Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It calls for dynamically advancing to win a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun started and successfully led by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Carried in Russian Magazine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Carried in Russian Magazine
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" and the historic report made by him at the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea were carried in the 90th issue of Forum, a magazine published in Russia.
					 The speech made by him at the military parade to celebrate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012) clarifies that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the immutable truth that the outstanding leader guarantees the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation. 
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to exalt the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The report made by him on March 31, Juche 102 (2013) sets forth the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as required by the prevailing situation and the developing Korean revolution. It also indicates the tasks and ways to do so.

articles.title: Day of Songun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Songun Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- There took place events in different counties on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Meetings, reading sessions and film shows were held in Benin, Nigeria and Malaysia on August 21.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Arms of Korea".
					
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin said:
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il opened up a new era of prosperity unprecedented in the history of the Korean nation spanning five thousands of years through his over half a century-long Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power.
					
					 He put forward the Korean People's Army as the pillar and main force for the socialist cause and saw to it that whole society learned from the revolutionary soldier spirit displayed by the service personnel.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy and members of the group noted that Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership is being given steady continuity by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. They praised him as a peerlessly great man with outstanding leadership ability, gifted commanding art and noble virtues.
					
					 The director of the Global Marketing Company of Malaysia said that President Kim Il Sung was the great brilliant commander who gave origin to Songun, defeated two imperialisms in one generation and defended the sovereignty of the country, adding:
					
					 As it has the strong military muscle, the DPRK is stepping up the building of a thriving socialist nation while shattering the moves of the U.S. styling itself the only superpower and its followers to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK as Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the Songun politics.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Benin.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Exercises Censured by Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Exercises Censured by Romanian Political Party
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Romania issued a statement on August 23 denouncing the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities are staging the frantic joint military exercises against the DPRK by mobilizing huge ground and naval forces.
					
					 The U.S. is describing Ulji Freedom Guardian as an "annual" and "defensive" drill but it is nothing but sophism to cover up its nature for aggression.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea saber-rattling for aggression is a dangerous move for igniting a war to wreck peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and, furthermore, to threaten world peace.
					
					 The Supreme Council of the Communist Party of Romania and all party members strongly condemn the madcap military exercises kicked up by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. should not underestimate the Korean people but stop all the war maneuvers for aggression including the military exercises and withdraw all its military equipment from south Korea without delay.
					
					 The heroic Korean people loving justice and peace will repulse any move for aggression on the part of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities and win a final victory without fail under the wise leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a jefes de Estado de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a jefes de Estado de varios paises
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio mensajes de respuesta a los jefes de Estado de varios paises que le enviaron notas de felicitacion con motivo del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					Entre los destinatarios figuran Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba; Bashar al-Assad, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria; Alpha Conde, Presidente de la Republica de Guinea; Hifikepunye Pohamba, Presidente de la Republica de Namibia; Thomas Motsoahe Thabane, Premier del Reino de Lesotho; Michael Chilufya Sata, Presidente de la Republica de Zambia; Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, Presidente de la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial; Idriss Deby Itno, Presidente y Jefe de Estado de la Republica de Chad; Alassane Ouattara, Presidente de la Republica de Cote d´Ivoire; Joseph Kabila Kabange, Presidente de la Republica Democratica del Congo; Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, Presidente de la Republica de Togo; Abdelaziz Bouteflika, Presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular; Yoweri Museveni, Presidente de la Republica de Uganda.
					
					En sus misivas, el Mariscal expreso profundo agradecimiento a los mandatarios extranjeros por haberle enviado calurosas felicitaciones y votos con motivo del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					Manifestando la conviccion de que se fortaleceran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los paises respectivos, deseo exitos en las tareas de los destinatarios por el desarrollo y la prosperidad de sus respectivos  paises.

articles.title: Instituido Dia del Songun como fiesta nacional
articles.content:
Instituido Dia del Songun como fiesta nacional
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se instituyo el Dia del Songun (el 25 de agosto) como una fiesta nacional. 
					El 25 de agosto de 1960, el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il realizo una visita de orientacion a la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Gracias a ese dia significativo, continuan firmemente la historia y las tradiciones de la revolucion coreana iniciada, avanzada y triunfada con los fusiles y se abrio la nueva era de la revolucion jucheana, la del Songun que siempre sale victoriosa marchando por la senda del Songun. 
					
					Reflejando la unanime voluntad y anhelo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos que abren nueva historia de esplendor de la Corea del Songun continuando  con toda fidelidad la idea revolucionaria del Songun y las proezas del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC toma la siguiente resolucion:
					
					1. Se instituira como fiesta nacional el 25 de agosto, Dia del Songun en que el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il dio su primera direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun. 
					
					2. El 25 de agosto de cada ano sera dia feriado nacional.
					
					3. Las unidades y subunidades del EPC izaran ese dia el estandarte de Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					4. Los organos estatales, empresas, entidades y familias izaran ese dia la bandera nacional de la RPDC.
					
					Quedo publicado el dia 26 el decreto correspondiente del organo legislativo.

articles.title: Cuadros de Partido y Estado celebran Dia de Juventud con jovenes
articles.content:
Cuadros de Partido y Estado celebran Dia de Juventud con jovenes
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los cuadros del Partido y el Estado celebraron este miercoles el Dia de la Juventud junto con los jovenes y estudiantes de distintas regiones del pais.
					  Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Phyong Hae, Ro Tu Chol y otros cuadros de la capital y las provincias felicitaron a los jovenes y estudiantes en el Complejo de Acero Chollima, el Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae, la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, el Instituto Superior de Ferrocarriles de Pyongyang, la Fabrica de Alambres Electricos 326 de Pyongyang, el Complejo de Maquinaria Pesada de Taean, el Complejo de Cemento de Sangwon y otras fabricas, empresas, granjas e institutos superiores.
					
					  Depositaron junto con los jovenes y estudiantes los cestos de flores y ramos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, sus retratos sonrientes, los murales de mosaicos con sus imagenes, las lapidas a la actividad historico-revolucionaria, etc. y les rindieron tributo.
					
					  Recorrieron la sala de educacion en la historia de la revolucion, la sala de presentacion del historial, el lugar de produccion, el aula, etc. y departieron con los jovenes y estudiantes ejemplares que logran exitos en la produccion, la construccion y el estudio en pleno acato al mensaje del Ano Nuevo y al llamamiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  Encomendaron a los jovenes que cumplan con su mision de vanguardia juvenil crecida en el regazo del partido en la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					  Los jovenes y estudiantes pasaron su fiesta con mucha alegria cantando, bailando y haciendo juegos deportivos y de recreo y otros actos culturales.

articles.title: Jovenes festejan Dia de Juventud
articles.content:
Jovenes festejan Dia de Juventud
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los jovenes y estudiantes de distintas localidades festejaron con bailes el Dia de la Juventud.
					En las explanadas frente al Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril y otros lugares de esta capital, los jovenes y estudiantes bailaron al compas de las canciones "Nombre querido", "Nuestro General es el mejor" y otras traduciendo el sentimiento de agradecimiento hacia el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien presento a los jovenes como flores del pais y nacion y destacamento mas vigoroso de la sociedad.
					
					Cantando las canciones como "Ongheya" y "Nodulgangbyon", ellos reflejaron el orgullo y dignidad de los jovenes coreanos que gozan de una vida feliz en el regazo del partido madre.
					
					Las canciones "Dedicare mi juventud a la patria", "Marcha del 27 de julio", "Fiesta de la gran victoria en la Guerra", "Hablan los duenos de esta tierra", etc. avivaron mas el ambiente festivo.
					
					El mismo dia, se efectuaron bailes de los jovenes y estudiantes en todas las cabezas provinciales, ciudades y distritos.

articles.title: Corea planea desarrollar turismo
articles.content:
Corea planea desarrollar turismo
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- "El Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tienen trazada la politica de desarrollar el turismo y nuestro pais cuenta con abundantes recursos turisticos"
					  Asi dijo a la ACNC el director de la Agencia de Viaje Internacional de Corea, Jo Song Gyu, y prosiguio:
					
					  La RPDC se esfuerza mucho por desarrollar el turismo como una industria importante.
					
					  Entrara en operacion regular las lineas aereas nacionales entre Pyongyang, Samjiyon, Wonsan y otras regiones turisticas para facilitar el viaje de los turistas nacionales y extranjeros.
					
					  Igualmente, se propone abrir las lineas internacionales entre Pyongyang y Shanghai, Yanji y otros lugares de China.
					
					  Muchos turistas del Sudeste Asiatico y Europa podran usar otras lineas para recorrer los lugares famosos de Corea.
					
					  Es posible que las zonas del monte Paektu, Wonsan y el monte Chilbo se conecten con varios paises y regiones por linea aerea internacional.
					
					  Se fundaran muchas zonas turisticas y de desarrollo economico.
					
					  Se reconstruiran magnificamente los lugares turisticos ya existentes y el turismo en las zonas de desarrollo economico, que se instauraran en todas las provincias, se desarrollara conforme a las caracteristicas locales.
					
					  Las zonas de fuentes termales, las costeras y los lugares famosos se transformaran al gusto del pueblo y los turistas extranjeros.
					
					  Esta en plena marcha la reconstruccion a nivel internacional de los hoteles capitalinos.
					
					  Se construiran las bases de deportes saludables y servicio general y las tiendas de souvenir y franquicias que serviran a los turistas.
					
					  Se planea promover la inversion extranjera para el desarrollo de turismo.
					
					  Se permitira a los extranjeros fundar la empresa independiente, la asociada y la mixta para que puedan invertir en las regiones turisticas, zonas de desarrollo economico, hoteles, tiendas de souvenir y otros proyectos y construirlos y administrarlos.
					
					  Las empresas extranjeras, que inviertan primero en Corea, tendran preferencias para que saquen provechos en un corto plazo.
					
					  Por otra parte, se cursara la invitacion a los especialistas extranjeros en varias esferas, incluyendo el desarrollo del lugar turistico y su administracion y la gestion de los hoteles, restaurantes y otras bases de servicio.
